sentence: salesforce.com, inc. ( CRM ) was a big mover last session, as the company saw its shares rise roughly 12% on the day.
Shares moved up on reports that the cloud-computing company has hired financial advisers to field takeover inquiries.
This led to solid volume too with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session.
This breaks the recent trend of the company as the stock is now trading above the near flat price range of $65.81-$68.47 over the past one-month time frame.
None of the estimates for this computer software stock were revised over the past 30 days.
The Zacks Consensus Estimate also remained unchanged over the same time frame.
Yesterday's price action is encouraging though, so make sure to keep a close watch on this firm in the near future.
salesforce.com has a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), while its Earnings ESP is 0.00%.
Investors interested in the space can also consider MicroStrategy Inc. ( MSTR ), sporting a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).
